title: Game developer distribution worldwide 2014 - 2017 , by gender
summary: The statistic depicts the answers Game developer from distribution worldwide from 2014 to 2017 .
For 2016 , the source projects the distribution worldwide Game developer to reach a total amount of around 2.57 billion U.S. dollars .

distribution worldwide - additional information A 2014 Statista survey conducted in the country has asked the question `` Have you ever heard of the term 'virtual worldwide ' _ ? '' A total of 92 % of respondents have answered positively , awareness being strongest among 30 to 39 year-olds .
gold: The statistic shows the distribution of game developers worldwide from 2014 to 2017 , broken down by gender . In 2017 , 74 percent of responding game developers were men , while 21 percent were women .
